about_the_game:
Bug Alliance is a pixel style top-down action RPG, where you play as bug warriors, each with unique abilities and weapons. Choose your Bug, select a game mode and dive into battles against worm tyranny. Fight, upgrade, farm resources, evolve and become stronger. Alliance is calling you!

-------------*******-------------*******-------------*******-------------*******-------------

THE STORY

After the Earth faces the catastrophic meteor strike, everything changes once and for all. With the extinction of humanity, it leaves its place to a new mutated life. This "New World" is mainly ruled by two forms of living, Bugs, and Worms. Worms try to devour the nature to feed their greedy King - Glutton.

Bugs, on the other hand, under the command of their Queens, pledged to protect the nature and the whole living from hoggish worms at any cost. After losing the great battle, bugs and their queens are captured, tortured, and enslaved. Many years later, bugs create a secret alliance, called “Requiem Society”, with the mission to unite all of the brave and mighty Bug warriors across the continent and fight back for the Volucris and the Queens!

-------------*******-------------*******-------------*******-------------*******-------------

FEATURES

  • Top-down shooter and RPG experience

  • Bug characters with unique abilities and weapons

  • Engaging game modes (Expedition mode is coming soon)

  • Challenging maps

  • Weapon & Character upgrades

  • Armory system (ascension and evolution)

GAME MECHANICS

ONSLAUGHT MODE

In Onslaught players have to outlast endless waves of swarming worms and fight for their lives. There are different maps with specific difficulties. Every 10th wave players encounter deadly bosses after which enemies become stronger. Also players collect essences while killing worms, which can be used to evolve characters later on.

RESISTANCE MODE
Resistance presents Tower Defense like game experience, where players defend their mining station against relentless waves of enemy assaults, strategically deploying towers. Players will gather valuable resources while defending their station as long as possible. The more mining the better farming.

EXPEDITION MODE (Coming Soon)
Expedition mode throws you into unpredictable, ever-changing battlegrounds where every room is a new challenge. Fight through enemy-infested zones, tackle unique objectives and decide whether to risk pushing forward or stock up at the trader. With escalating difficulty, an endless mode, and a story-driven adventure unfolding piece by piece, every expedition is a thrilling test of skill, strategy, and endurance.

THE ARMORY

Players can evolve their favorite bug character, as well as upgrading their arsenal (weapons and abilities). Collect essence and resources, evolve your bug, make it stronger and embark on harder levels. Meanwhile upgrade your weapons and abilities, make your bug warrior unstoppable. Reveal legendary skills of your bug warrior.

UPCOMING FEATURES

  • Expedition game mode

  • Challenges & Achievements

  • New unique Bug characters

  • New engaging maps

  • Relics and Power-ups

  • Co-op mode

  • End-game Features

and more to be decided together with our great community
